mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (id, name, company_name, kan_code, vendor_id, registration_date, manager_id, activation) VALUES (UUID(), #{name}, #{company_name}, #{kan_code}, #{vendor_id}, CURDATE(), #{manager_id}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{name}, company_name = #{company_name},kan_code = #{kan_code}, vendor_id = #{vendor_id}, manager_id = #{manager_id}, registration_date = CURDATE() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.company_name, p.kan_code, p.vendor_id, p.registration_date, p.manager_id, p.activation, v.name as vendor_name, v.president_name, a.name as account_name, pc.cls_nm_1, pc.cls_nm_2, pc.cls_nm_3, pc.cls_nm_4 FROM product as p left join vendor as v on p.vendor_id = v.id left join account as a on p.manager_id = a.id left join product_category as pc on p.kan_code = pc.kan_code WHERE p.activation != 0 ORDER BY p.registration_date limit #{start} , #{count}

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.company_name, p.kan_code, p.vendor_id, p.registration_date, p.manager_id, p.activation, v.name as vendor_name, v.president_name, a.name as account_name, pc.cls_nm_1, pc.cls_nm_2, pc.cls_nm_3, pc.cls_nm_4 FROM product as p left join vendor as v on p.vendor_id = v.id left join account as a on p.manager_id = a.id left join product_category as pc on p.kan_code = pc.kan_code WHERE p.id = #{id}
